definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="world_data_checkdifficulty"><field name="difficulty">HARD</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:InfinityMode</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:InfinityMode</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Infinity mode activated.</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:InfinityMode</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Infinity mode diactivated.</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Your difficulty too low. You should use this item on "Hard" difficulcy.</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
